
Number of sunspot groups and individual sunspots recorded by Tevel for the period 1816â€“1836 in the Dalton Minimum

Original source: V.M.S. Carrasco, 2021, submitted to Astrophysical Journal.

FIRST COLUMN - year of the observation
SECOND COLUMN - month of the observation
THIRD COLUMN - day of the observation
FOURTH COLUMN - hour of the observation
FIFTH COLUMN - number of sunspot groups
SIXTH COLUMN - number of single sunspots
